title: New patch not working
body: At about 28% the patcher stops working and says i need to retry, ive retried it 4 times and its still not working!

replies.body:
Hmm.. Try launching league from the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file as admin (right-click, *run as administrator*) from inside your installation directory, which should be located here:

> **C:\Riot Games\League of Legends**

Let me know if this fixed it for ya. ^.^
